title: Did tristana REALLY need an omega squad skin???
body: I mean doesn't she already have a modern military skin and she just got a new skin for holloween I just feel like the whole military skin thing is super played out on tristana I mean like she's already in the military with her classic skin right? Plus the other skin she had I can't think of the name right now and now omega squad? Common riot there were way better candidates for that skin I feel she should could be swapped out and replaced with either ziggs,rumble,kled,or heimerdinger.

replies.body:
I agree that other champs could have fit in the role a bit better.

However, I think that the Omega Squad does need a leader, and you don't have many champs to choose from when it comes to an "all-yordle" squad.

They definitely couldn't have given it to Kled, or Corki, or Poppy, or Rumble, or...

also, the Omega Squad needs an ADC! Twitch doesn't count because idk lol
